about_the_game:
This is a 90 minute playable demo of Smack Monkey.

If you enjoy, please consider purchasing the full game on release!

CAW!!!

Smack Monkey: Never Stop Smacking

Reject humanity. Return to monkey.

Mr. Marcus Monkey slept in and is now late for his date with his hot monkey girlfriend!!!! Jump, climb and smack your way to the top of Sunset Mountain!

Smack Monkey is a satisfying precision platformer where you climb fast! (and fall even faster...)

~Mr. Marcus Monkey has the shmoves~

  • Press "Smack" to do a horizontal smack jump on the ground or vines!

  • Press "Smack" before you smash into a wall to do a vertical smack climb!

  • Press "Jump" three times in succession to perform a triple jump!

  • If you mess up however... You might fall down! Save yourself from losing progress by smacking or jumping out of a death spiral!

Your buddy Eric the Toucan will guide you on your quest to scaling Sunset Mountain.

Also... watch out for bananas, frostadiles and pointy ice... They'll get ya!!

Listen to legendary classical tracks from the great minds of Debussey, Erik Satie and more, performed live by a highly trained monkey on a marimba.

And listen... If you smack your way into hidden locations, you might even find a secret frog or two... ribbit.

The game is designed for speed-runners! There's a built-in timer, an optional tutorial and variable endings based on completion time.
